title: ANREALAGE NOISE WatchFace
summary: New WatchFace was born from the fashion brand ANREALAGE.
description: New WatchFace was born from the fashion brand ANREALAGE.Time and logo emerge from among the Noise. Thereby , you can enjoy an impressive performance . -----------------------------------By tilting your Android Wear Watch a special designed raster top-layer starts moving to the equivalent direction, revealing the time hidden beneath until the top-layer moves out of sight completely and leaving the screen in complete noise. Also, by tapping the screen the ANREALAGE logo reveals itself with  noise. It corresponds to both round and square sizes, and has an optimized ambient mode.IN THE NOISEIT BECOMES MEANINGLESSCODE THE NOISEIT MAKES MEANINGFUL-----------------------------------PROFILEANREALAGE is a combination of words of ''A REAL, UNREAL and AGE''. Designer/Kunihiko Morinaga, born in 1980 in Tokyo, graduated from Waseda University and Vantan Design Academy. He Launched his activities with ANREALAGE in 2003. Working under the mantra, "God is in the details". He was honored with the Avan-garde Grand Prix award at Gen Art in New York in 2005. He began participating in the Tokyo Collection the following year. In 2011, he won the 29th Mainichi Fashion Grand Prix for the best new designer and Shiseido incentive award in Tokyo. His first solo exhibition, "A REAL UN REAL AGE" was held at Parco Museum in Tokyo in 2012 and traveled in Japan. He presented his first women's collection during Paris Fashion Week in 2014. With more than 50 points of sales worldwide, ANREALAGE states as an innovative and creative Japanese fashion brand.
descriptionHTML:
New WatchFace was born from the fashion brand ANREALAGE.
Time and logo emerge from among the Noise. Thereby , you can enjoy an impressive performance .

-----------------------------------

By tilting your Android Wear Watch a special designed raster top-layer starts moving to the equivalent direction, revealing the time hidden beneath until the top-layer moves out of sight completely and leaving the screen in complete noise. Also, by tapping the screen the ANREALAGE logo reveals itself with noise.
It corresponds to both round and square sizes, and has an optimized ambient mode.


IN THE NOISE

IT BECOMES MEANINGLESS

CODE THE NOISE

IT MAKES MEANINGFUL

-----------------------------------
PROFILE

ANREALAGE is a combination of words of ''A REAL, UNREAL and AGE''. Designer/Kunihiko Morinaga, born in 1980 in Tokyo, graduated from Waseda University and Vantan Design Academy. He Launched his activities with ANREALAGE in 2003. Working under the mantra, "God is in the details". He was honored with the Avan-garde Grand Prix award at Gen Art in New York in 2005. He began participating in the Tokyo Collection the following year. In 2011, he won the 29th Mainichi Fashion Grand Prix for the best new designer and Shiseido incentive award in Tokyo. His first solo exhibition, "A REAL UN REAL AGE" was held at Parco Museum in Tokyo in 2012 and traveled in Japan. He presented his first women's collection during Paris Fashion Week in 2014. With more than 50 points of sales worldwide, ANREALAGE states as an innovative and creative Japanese fashion brand.
comments: Does not work on LG URBANE Screen flickers. Useless unless fixed.
Doesn't Work The screen flickers and is covered in "noise". Can't see the time until the watch goes dim. Waste of time downloading.
Doesn't work Doesn't work. Don't bother
recentChanges: アイコンを切り替えました。
